title: 28 Pranks Later
dialog: We wanna hit every house in Ponyville!

title: 28 Pranks Later
dialog: Hmm. The sewing machine cake is actually better than the cake cake.

title: 28 Pranks Later
dialog: What happened to all of our friends?

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: I thought we weren't going to wander off again.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: It's actually kind of sweet of him to help us out like this.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Come on, we've gone far enough! It's time to go back!

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: Poor Trouble Shoes. I can't believe those mean judges would laugh at him like that.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: That all depends on how you look at it.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: I don't know... All these events look a little, well, dangerous.

title: Appleoosa's Most Wanted
dialog: But he never wanted to ruin any rodeos! Those were just bad accidents!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: But maybe we'll see you later.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: It's lucky we're all scared of the same things. That way we can help and remind each other to just be who we are!

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: I'm glad she's happy, but I sure wouldn't want to be up to my flank in mane hair all day. Can you imagine getting stuck with a cutie mark you didn't like?

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Um, yeah... the thing is...

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: And we certainly don't have time to hang out at an old clubhouse.

title: Bloom & Gloom
dialog: Yeah. Apple Bloom, what's this all about?

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Pretty great they're letting you participate even though you're not technically sisters.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: It's sweet he wants to help you out like this. Weird, but sweet.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: Hey, Apple Bloom, the Social's gonna start in a few hours. Thought you might want to go with us.

title: Brotherhooves Social
dialog: That's awful nice of you to say, cousin Orchard Blossom! I've been told before I'm pretty observant.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: No, it means she's full of potential.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: Let's see if there are any cookies.

title: Call of the Cutie
dialog: She could be a great scientist, or an amazing artist, or a famous writer. She could even be mayor of Ponyville someday.

title: Campfire Tales
dialog: We got to hear legendary stories and go on an adventure.

title: Campfire Tales
dialog: And I've got the bites to prove it.

title: Campfire Tales
dialog: Yup. This time, you only packed three suitcases.

title: Campfire Tales
dialog: I think she's my favorite legend too.

title: Campfire Tales
dialog: How? Our camp was so pretty, and this cave is so... not.

title: Campfire Tales
dialog: Wait a minute. All by himself?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Not really, since we kind of overheard you yesterday.

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Especially where our playground equipment should be?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Yeah, and I think that's way more important than worrying about our cutie marks, don't you?

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: Well, if that's how you treat your best friend, then I choose Pipsqueak!

title: Crusaders of the Lost Mark
dialog: And our journey here is never really done

title: Equestria Games
dialog: We tried to talk him into it...

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: And that gives me an idea!

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: Well, you can't run off... but maybe somepony else can!

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: Apple Bloom's sick! Looks like she might have to stay home all week!

title: Family Appreciation Day
dialog: Snap out of it. We're here to help you!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: But that's not true, Scootaloo!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Ms. Harshwhinny never said anything about that!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I'm just too tired! I can't keep going!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I can't believe you're quitting on us!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: But there's one problem! I bet everypony in class is planning to compete!

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: Not without you, Scootaloo.

title: Flight to the Finish
dialog: I do not like them one bit.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: I kept meaning to ask her, I really did, but I worked so hard on this play. I wrote it especially for the three of us! I directed it, I'm in it, I made the costumes... It's just that this is really my time to shine doing something completely myself, and I really wanted to keep it that way!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [muffled] At least Sapphire Shores won't be all like "Ooh, who fetched you that red ribbon? Because I don't care about anything else you made. All I care about is that amazing red ribbon!"

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: But you have to let us in! I'm Sapphire Shores' designer's sister! You have to believe us!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: But then I realized I didn't want your future to be ruined forever and ever, so I came back to change it before it was too late! So... here it is. It's all fixed. Please forgive me.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: No, they were perfect, and that was the whole problem!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: You gotta see this with the cinnamon ribbon! You'll love it!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Admit you made those dresses too good on purpose!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Funny, I thought I was the only one who got worried about stuff like that.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: How could you?! "Oh, what amazing dresses! Oh, how I love the dresses! Ooh, dresses, dresses, dresses, dresses!"

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Here we are, the stars of the show!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Finally, I was perfect, and then went to the stairs to enter like the belle of the ball. When I finally came out of my room, I found the party going on without me.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Forsooth and anon, I cometh forthwith and posthaste with glad tidings, miladies.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [screams] I don't wanna see any more!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: She's been very busy lately!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Rarity? [gasps] Oh no! The box is... gone? I'm too late! She left for Canterlot!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Wait, come back! Luna? Can you hear me? Thank you for what you did! Help, Luna! Luuuna!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, good! This is just a dream!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: [sighs] I hope everything goes alright for her tomorrow.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Look at the stitching, real close.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Don't act like you don't remember. Or are you trying to prove you're a better actress than me too?!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: At least everypony else who was able to stay loved it.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Oh, it just came to me... in a dream. I'm sorry I got jealous about those dresses. I know now that you were only trying to help.

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Yes, good. Not jaw-dropping amazing!

title: For Whom the Sweetie Belle Toils
dialog: Tomorrow night. For the opening night of our show!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Right... Well, I sure am happy to see you, and spending the day with you does sound like a lot of fun, but... I'm kind of right in the middle of something important. I have responsibilities and...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Cutie Mark Crusaders mid-mission here!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Rarity, this is hard for me to say, but... um...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [laughs nervously, sighs] That was, uh... one tasty bite. Still a little hungry, though.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: You don't still play with the same toys from when you were a foal, do you?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: [sighs] I dunno. It's no big deal. This is great.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: You sure you two can handle our client here?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: That's just it! I used to! That's not who I am anymore!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: You have the CMC guarantee! No matter what it takes, we promise you'll have our full attention.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Okay, Zipporwhill. What do you see?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Hey, Zipporwhill. What are you doing here? Where are Apple Bloom and Scootaloo?

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Well, I do have one idea...

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Huh. I remember it being much bigger.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh. Right. From when I was a little filly.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Really?! If you still think I like doing this stuff, then maybe you don't know me at all!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Oh, um... I guess another scoop would be fine!

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Pretty sure it's Zipporwhill. She needs help reconnecting with her cutie mark <U+0096> three puppy paw prints.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: I, um, guess I just prefer black box experimental theater.

title: Forever Filly
dialog: Aww, Rarity! I love being with you too! That will never change! But... maybe we could just try to do different things together?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Besides, I know exactly what to do! When I was younger, I read all the fairy tales.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: We're just gonna have to keep trying! Big Mac, are you ready to take it up a notch?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: We're pretty sure she likes you! I mean, she keeps ordering apples just so she can see you again.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Hey, Apple Bloom! Rarity's reorganizing her shop, and look what she found! Old costumes from the talent show!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: It doesn't really count when you trick a pony into drinking a love potion, does it?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Hey! That's our metaphorical sunset they're riding off into!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Well, I was younger on the way here!

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: That's an awful long way for a pony to go, isn't it?

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: It was a long ride! Anyway, as long as we do what the book says, you're pretty much guaranteed a happy ending. Uh, how about this one? "Rescuing a damsel-pony-in-distress." That's perfect! Of course, we'll have to improvise without a dragon.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: So nothing fishy's going on.

title: Hard to Say Anything
dialog: Yeah. He totally blushed when you brought up how often he's been going to Starlight's old village.
